portfolio.title: Paweł Stopczyński - Technologies & Portfolio
portfolio.description: FullStack Developer with technology stack: React, Symfony, Angular, PHP

about.name: Paweł Stopczyński
about.first:
My programming journey started back in high school when I realized that HTML alone wasn't sufficient while creating a Guest Book. At first, I learned about PHP by making websites for
                my school's teachers. Eventually, I got into frameworks,
                starting with Code Igniter and later Symfony. But all along, I
                could see that this approach wasn't flawless.
about.second:
That's when I got the opportunity to work on a React project, and a few years later, on one with Angular. In both cases, I joined the project without prior knowledge of the framework. In
                the near future, I plan to learn Vue, and further down the line,
                I aim to explore Python by creating a more complex project.
about.hobby: After hours, I'm an almost professional photographer, I ride a bike, I dance Cuban salsa, and sometimes I play the guitar. When it rains, I take care of plants and seek attention from my cat

stages.angular: Angular has shown me that best practices from Symfony can also be applied to frontend programming.
stages.react: Discovering React has redefined my understanding of programming quality and clean code.
stages.scrum: I first encountered SCRUM when learning Angular, but I became a true fan when I saw what our team achieved together.
stages.symfony: Discovering Symfony made me rethink the idea of "Why use a framework when I can do it myself." While I could manage, the efficiency and quality provided by Symfony are unmatched.

skills.angular: Worked in a SCRUM team for 2 years as the Lead Frontend Developer.
skills.react: Developed 12 websites, e-commerce platforms, and booking portals.
skills.code_igniter: Completed over 30 projects, including product systems, e-commerce sites, and business websites.
skills.js_ts: Experience with React, Angular, Webpack, and strong typing with TypeScript.
skills.php_mysql: Countless lines of code written in pure PHP and subsequently in various newly discovered frameworks.
skills.seo: Configuration issues, but also writing code rules for SEO.
skills.linux_bash: Configured and managed VPS servers, created scripts for multiple projects, and developed an installer for CentOS.
skills.symfony: Finished 7 custom software solutions while maintaining constant client communication.
skills.python: Single attempts to work with Python, mainly for hobby work with microcircuits ESP32/ESP8266.
